long_description: The Brooks Ghost 6 road-running shoes are highly breathable for sustained comfort during hard-charging runs. Light, cushioned, and responsive, they're ideal for neutral runners. Lightweight and flexible polyester and nylon mesh uppers are abrasion resistant, breathable and dry quickly; overlays provide structure and support. Polyester and nylon air-mesh linings provide great moisture management to keep feet comfortable on the run. Special EVA compound used for the insole boards supplies excellent cushioning and flexibility. Midsoles feature BioMoGo foam polymer alloy, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfill. DNA cushioning uses high-viscosity liquid pods to react instantly to each step as you run, providing a custom amount of cushioning for your running style. Midsoles and outsoles are designed to align the foot in an efficient, balanced position throughout the gait cycle, offering great cushioning and flexibility. Brooks Ghost 6 road-running shoes boast outsoles with a blend of blown rubber and regular rubber for balanced durability and grippy traction. Outsoles also feature a special crash pad design that smooths out the landing zone, maximizing efficiency and feel throughout the heel strike. All-synthetic construction makes the Brooks Ghost 6 shoes vegan friendly.
short_description: The Brooks Ghost 6 road-running shoes are highly breathable for sustained comfort during hard-charging runs. Light, cushioned, and responsive, they're ideal for neutral runners.
